meanings.definition: Press (a design or inscription) into a surface.
meanings.sent1: She used a special tool to deboss her initials onto the leather wallet.
meanings.sent2: The artisan carefully debossed the logo onto the book cover.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to deboss its paw prints onto the wet cement.
meanings.sent4: His words seemed to deboss themselves into her heart, leaving a lasting impression.
meanings.sent5: The hammer debossed a beautiful pattern onto the metal sheet.

meanings.definition: The process of creating a design or inscription by pressing it into a surface.
meanings.sent1: The deboss on the paper added a touch of elegance to the invitation.
meanings.sent2: The debossing of the company logo on the packaging was done with precision.
meanings.sent3: The cake decorator attempted a deboss of flowers on the frosting, but it turned out abstract.
meanings.sent4: The deboss on the monument symbolized unity and strength.
meanings.sent5: The deboss of the seal on the document made it official and authentic.
